[Author](/docs/phil/people/Ludwig Wittgenstein.html)

> My fundamental idea is that the ‘logical constants’ are not representatives; that there can be no representatives of the _logic_ of facts

— [Tractatus Logico-Philosophicus](/docs/phil/works/Tractatus Logico-Philosophicus.html) 4.0312

Prior to this development (e.g. in [Russell](/docs/phil/people/Bertrand Russell.html) and earlier [Wittgenstein](/docs/phil/people/Ludwig Wittgenstein.html)) logical atomists looked for negative/conditional/negative existential facts in the world.
